languages.text: "Арбитес уже используют тактики устрашения. Но, судя по тому, каких ублюдков я постоянно встречаю, эти тактики не работают".
"The Arbites already use fear as a weapon. But judging by the bastards I keep meeting, our tactics are next to useless."
languages.original_text: "Арбитес уже используют тактики устрашения. Но, судя по тому, каких ублюдков я постоянно встречаю, эти тактики не работают".

traits.locale_text: "The Arbites already uses fear as a weapon. But judging by the bastards I keep meeting, our tactics are next to useless."
"The Arbites already uses fear as a weapon. But judging by the bastards I keep meeting, our tactics are next to useless."
"The Arbites already uses fear as a weapon. But judging by the bastards I keep meeting, our tactics are next to useless."
"The Arbites already use fear as a weapon. But judging by the bastards I keep meeting, our tactics are next to useless."
"The Arbites already use fear as a weapon. But judging by the bastards I keep meeting, our tactics are next to useless."

languages.text: 「高等裁定局はもともと恐怖を武器にしてる。でも、クズどもを見ると、俺たちのやり方はほとんど役に立ってないみたいだな」
languages.original_text: "The Arbites already use fear as a weapon. But judging by the bastards I keep meeting, our tactics are next to useless."

traits.locale_text: 「高等裁定局はもともと恐怖を武器にしてる。でも、クズどもを見ると、俺たちのやり方はほとんど役に立ってないみたいだな」
「高等裁定局はもともと恐怖を武器にしてる。でも、クズどもを見ると、俺たちのやり方はほとんど役に立ってないみたいだな」

languages.text: "Das Arbites setzt Angst bereits als Waffe ein. Aber angesichts der Menge der Übeltäter, denen ich begegne, scheinen unsere Taktiken praktisch nutzlos zu sein."
languages.original_text: "The Arbites already use fear as a weapon. But judging by the bastards I keep meeting, our tactics are next to useless."

traits.locale_text: "Das Arbites setzt Angst bereits als Waffe ein. Aber angesichts der Menge der Übeltäter, denen ich begegne, scheinen unsere Taktiken praktisch nutzlos zu sein."

languages.text: « L'Arbites se sert déjà de la peur comme d'une arme. Mais à en juger par le nombre d'ordures que je continue de croiser, nos tactiques actuelles ne suffisent pas. »
languages.original_text: "The Arbites already use fear as a weapon. But judging by the bastards I keep meeting, our tactics are next to useless."

traits.locale_text: « L'Arbites se sert déjà de la peur comme d'une arme. Mais à en juger par le nombre d'ordures que je continue de croiser, nos tactiques actuelles ne suffisent pas. »

languages.text: «El Arbites ya emplea el miedo como arma. Pero a juzgar por la cantidad de malnacidos con los que no dejo de toparme, se trata de una táctica inútil».
languages.original_text: "The Arbites already use fear as a weapon. But judging by the bastards I keep meeting, our tactics are next to useless."

traits.locale_text: «El Arbites ya emplea el miedo como arma. Pero a juzgar por la cantidad de malnacidos con los que no dejo de toparme, se trata de una táctica inútil».
«El Arbites ya emplea el miedo como arma. Pero a juzgar por la cantidad de malnacidos con los que no dejo de toparme, se trata de una táctica inútil».

languages.text: “法务部已经把恐惧当作武器来用了，但我们依然会遇到各种各样的渣滓。看来，我们的做法几乎完全没起到作用。”
languages.original_text: "The Arbites already use fear as a weapon. But judging by the bastards I keep meeting, our tactics are next to useless."

traits.locale_text: “法务部已经把恐惧当作武器来用了，但我们依然会遇到各种各样的渣滓。看来，我们的做法几乎完全没起到作用。”
“法务部已经把恐惧当做武器来用了，但我们依然会遇到各种各样的渣滓。看来，我们的做法几乎完全没起到作用。”

languages.text: "Arbites, korkuyu silah olarak kullanıyor zaten. Ancak tanıştığım adilere bakılacak olursa stratejilerimiz pek işe yaramıyor."
languages.original_text: "The Arbites already use fear as a weapon. But judging by the bastards I keep meeting, our tactics are next to useless."

traits.locale_text: "Arbites, korkuyu silah olarak kullanıyor zaten. Ancak tanıştığım adilere bakılacak olursa stratejilerimiz pek işe yaramıyor."
"Arbites, korkuyu silah olarak kullanıyor zaten. Ancak tanıştığım adilere bakılacak olursa stratejilerimiz pek işe yaramıyor."
